contentList.content: You are <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistant</LSTag> to Necrotic damage and non-magical Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage, taking only half damage from them.
The vampire ascendant regains [1] at the start of its turn.
Sink your fangs into a living creature and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="HP_REDUCTION_VAMPIRE">Sap</LSTag> its blood.
Regain [1] at the start of your turn.
Behold, the Vampire Ascendant! Thousands of souls have bought you power, granting you fearsome vampiric powers and absolving you of its weaknesses.

You are the pinnacle of vampire-kind and, as such, are <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immune</LSTag> to Cold and Necrotic damage as well as the <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHARMED">Charmed</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="EXHAUSTED">Exhausted</LSTag> conditions.

You can perceive your surroundings without relying on sight within [1]. You are able to detect <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INVISIBLE">Invisible</LSTag> creatures, ignores darkness penalties, and don't suffer the disadvantages to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blindness</LSTag>.

Affected entity can perceive their surroundings without relying on sight within [1] and are able to detect <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INVISIBLE">Invisible</LSTag> creatures, ignores darkness penalties, and ignore the disadvantages to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blindness</LSTag>.
